## Library
```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)

maf <- fread("merged.maf", sep = "\t", data.table = TRUE)

```

```{r}
maf <- maf %>%
  mutate(
    patient = substr(Tumor_Sample_Barcode, 1, 12), # 1-12 patient ID
    sample_type_code = substr(Tumor_Sample_Barcode, 14, 15),  # 14-15 is sample type. "01" primary, "06" metastatic
    sample_type = case_when(
      sample_type_code == "01" ~ "Primary",
      sample_type_code == "06" ~ "Metastatic",
      TRUE ~ "Other"
    )
  )
genes <- c("BRAF","NRAS","NF1") #NF1 is a cancer suppressor gene, better to use non-silent mutation

maf2 <- maf %>%
  filter(
    Hugo_Symbol %in% genes,
    Variant_Classification == "Missense_Mutation"
  )
write_csv(maf2, '/Users/wuye/Desktop/Capstone project/PLM-capstone-project/SKCM.csv')
```
